  • Method Details

    • login

      public String login(String username, String password, boolean signUp) throws IOException
      Sends a request to a remote server for a login request. Receives and processes the response.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to sign in with
      password - the password to sign in with
      signUp - whether the user is signing up (new account)
      Returns:
      the JSON response from the server
      Throws:
      IOException - on response reading failed

    • resize

      public void resize(int width, int height)
      Relocate the widget to be in the center when the window is resized.
      Parameters:
      width - the new width of the screen
      height - the new height of the screen
